description: This file defines Pydantic models for recipe data schemas, including base, create, update, and output models, as well as a rating creation model.

classes.name: RecipeBase
classes.description: Base schema for recipe data, including title, description, ingredients, steps, tags, metadata, and average rating.

classes.name: RecipeCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new recipe, inherits from RecipeBase.

classes.name: RecipeUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating an existing recipe, all fields optional.

classes.name: RecipeOut
classes.description: Schema for outputting recipe data, includes ID and owner ID.

classes.name: RatingCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a rating, includes rating score and optional comment.

methods.name: ConfigDict
methods.description: Configuration class for Pydantic models to control attribute population and serialization.
